settings.custom_liquid:
Embrace {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }}'s slopes daily with our sleek, dual-layer trail map phone case.
  • Dual-Layer Protection: A robust shell and cushioning liner keeping your device safe on and off the slopes.
  • Perfect Fit: Precision-cut port openings ensure easy access to all functions without sacrificing protection.
  • Wireless Charging: Fully compatible with wireless charging, enabling effortless power-ups.
  • The Real Trail Map: Features the actual {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} trail map, turning your phone into an epic piece of art.

settings.title: Epic Protection For Your Phone
settings.text: Slide into the season with style and security! Our {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} ski resort trail map phone case isn’t just a phone protector; it’s a statement of passion for the peaks. Meticulously designed, this case combines the toughness of a polycarbonate outer shell with the shock-absorbing features of a TPU liner, ensuring your device withstands the bumps and drops of daily adventures. Precision-engineered port openings maintain functionality, while wireless charging compatibility adds convenience. More than just a case, it's a showcase of your love for {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }}’s legendary trails, rendered artistically to turn your phone into a mini gallery of your favorite mountain moments.
